name: drskradley
text: I found out recently that every time I pronounce anything in Chinese to my students (who are Chinese, from Fujian) I speak in "that stupid-ass Beijing accent".  Serves me right for watching that Chinese-language news when it's on.

text: It really should be a ratio, obviously the average person wants to see a comment with 82 chubbies and 10 lames. Any comment that gets enough attention, even if it gets hundreds of chubbies, will eventually collect a few lames.

text: My first thought on this strip was that she's a mail-order bride. A mail-order Chinese toy otter bride. Ordered by Teodor.
